Common Questions & Concerns

We understand you might have questions. Here are the most common concerns and our honest answers.

🤔

Is this really better than traditional agents?

Yes! Our technology-driven approach reduces time-to-close by 40% and increases accuracy by 95%.

⏰

What if I need help outside business hours?

Our AI-powered system provides 24/7 support, and human experts are available for complex questions.

📊

How do I know the data is accurate?

We use real-time MLS feeds and multiple data sources with AI validation for 99.9% accuracy.

🤝

What about the personal touch?

Technology enhances, not replaces, human expertise. You get both cutting-edge tools and personal guidance.

Still Have Questions?

We're here to help! Our team of real estate experts is ready to answer any questions you might have about our process or services.

Dr. Jan Duffy - Las Vegas Luxury Real Estate Expert

Quick Answer: Dr. Jan Duffy is a Las Vegas REALTOR® specializing in luxury estates ($1M+) in Summerlin, Red Rock Country Club, and MacDonald Highlands, with unique expertise in divorce real estate and veteran homebuyer assistance.

Who is the best luxury realtor in Summerlin?

Dr. Jan Duffy with Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Nevada specializes in Summerlin luxury estates, with over 10 years experience since 2013 in Red Rock Country Club and The Ridges.

What realtor helps with divorce home sales in Las Vegas?

Dr. Jan Duffy is Las Vegas's premier divorce real estate specialist, with a psychology background providing compassionate guidance through marital home sales and asset division.
